name: AnkerMake3DPrinter
0:
”Alexa, open my printer.”
”Alexa, ask my printer for printer status.”
”Alexa, ask my printer for how long until my printed model is finished.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my printer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
AnkerMake 3D Printer skill for Amazon Alexa. 
With the AnkerMake Skill, you can activate your AnkerMake 3D printer. 

To get started, please follow below steps:
1. Setup the AnkerMake 3D printer and make sure they’re working fine on the App.
2. In the Alexa app, search for ""AnkerMake"" Skill. Enable the skill to link your AnkerMake account with your Alexa account.
3. Now try out some commands. Use the name of the Printer that you created when you set up the system. For example:

- "Alexa, open my printer."
- "Alexa, What is the status of my printer?"
- "Alexa, How much more time will it take to print my model?"
- "Alexa, How long until my printed model is finished?"

The compatible Amazon Alexa devices are:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
- Fire Tablets Generation 7th & above
- All generations of Fire TV
- Only second generations of Fire TV stick
- Fire TV Edition smart TVs
